title: Bug 120315: Display property not taking effect in new PDF emitter when set to 'none'
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is not being applied in the new PDF emitter.
EB: The display property set to 'none' should hide the item in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the new PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Verify that the item is still visible in the PDF emitter, instead of being hidden.
